# hyh

warden

OG Warden

Available for Hire

Independent smart contracts security researcher, LSR at Spearbit

## Highlights

  * [Ranked #4 on Code4rena all-time Leaderboard](https://twitter.com/0xhyh/status/1621272460577366022)

As of June 2023, I was ranked #4 on the Code4rena all-time leaderboard

  * [Led series of Union v2 and Ajna Finance security reviews on Sherlock](https://github.com/ajna-finance/audits)

I led audits for Union v2 (reported 8 of 9 high severity issues found in 2
contests) and Ajna Finance (12 of 17 highs in 2 contests), both projects are
now live

## hyh's Activity

The Activity Stream is currently in beta. [Share feedback here](/help).

## Available for hire

EVM

[Get a quote](https://code4rena.typeform.com/solo-audit#warden=hyh&source=hyh-
profile)

  * [Twitter](https://twitter.com/0xhyh)
